name: Peasant's Stew
description: A simple meat-and-vegetable stew, mostly potatoes.

name: Hunter's Broth
description: Hearty stew with fresh game and wild roots.

name: Golden Elk Ragu
description: A slow-roasted elk stew with fire-charred onions and aged stock.

name: Crumbly Sugar Biscuit
description: Dry and overly sweet, but beloved by children.

name: Autumn Berry Tart
description: A golden crust filled with local berries and honey glaze.

name: Royal Custard Crown
description: A multilayered cream dessert served with candied petals.

name: Firestick Jerky
description: Chewy meat sticks laced with hot peppers.

name: Dragonspice Chili
description: A fiery mix of beans, meat, and wildfire sauce.

name: Hellboar Ribs
description: Char-grilled ribs smothered in molten chili glaze.

name: Stoneground Flatbread
description: Dense flatbread made with coarse flour and forest grains.

name: Forager's Pie
description: A warm pie stuffed with mushrooms and root vegetables.

name: Druid's Table
description: Forest greens, wild grains, and enchanted truffle oil.

name: Pickled Bits Plate
description: A mix of sharp pickled roots and eggs.

name: Sour Apple Pork
description: Grilled pork with tangy green apple glaze.

name: Vinegar-Cured Quail
description: Delicately cured quail with a reduction of wine vinegar.
